name: crustysocks
description: A simple pixel art pictionary game. Draw by number and guess the word.

scripts.test: cd client && npx vitest && cd ../server && npm test
scripts.install: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.dev: cd server && npm run dev && cd ../client && npm run dev
scripts.lint: cd client && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:server && npm run deploy:client
scripts.git:push: git add . && git commit -m "update" && git push
